views.view: WITH dolg AS (SELECT kodp, SUM (n2) AS summ FROM rr_temp t INNER JOIN m_facvip f ON f.kod_sf = t.n5 LEFT JOIN m_debet d ON d.kod_deb = f.kod_deb WHERE skod = '22160-sf' -- фильтр по долгу укладывающемуся в срок исковой давности, т.е. тот которому менее 35 месяцев от текущей даты AND NVL (d.dat_deb, f.dat_sf) > ADD_MONTHS (SYSDATE, -35) GROUP BY kodp) SELECT dolg.kodp, a.name, dolg.summ, (SELECT COUNT (*) AS kol_pr FROM hr_arx_pred c2 WHERE c2.kodp = c.kodp AND c2.nom_tlg IS NOT NULL) AS kol_pred, hr_tf.dolg_last_pred (c.kodp) AS dat_last_pred, (SELECT COUNT (*) AS kol_tex FROM hr_dogpotr c3, hr_arx_tex c2 WHERE c3.kodp = c.kodp AND (c3.date_fin IS NULL OR c3.date_fin > SYSDATE) AND c2.codeabon = c3.codeabon AND c2.nom_tlg IS NOT NULL) AS kol_tex, (SELECT MAX (b.dat_tlg) FROM hr_dogpotr a2, hr_arx_tex b WHERE a2.kodp = c.kodp AND (a2.date_fin IS NULL OR a2.date_fin > SYSDATE) AND b.codeabon = a2.codeabon AND b.nom_tlg IS NOT NULL) AS last_dat_tex, (SELECT DISTINCT d.name FROM hr_dogpotr a2, hr_arx_tex cc, n_sved d WHERE a2.kodp = c.kodp AND (a2.date_fin IS NULL OR a2.date_fin > SYSDATE) AND cc.codeabon = a2.codeabon AND cc.dat_tlg = (SELECT MAX (dat_tlg) FROM hr_arx_tex WHERE codeabon = cc.codeabon AND nom_tlg IS NOT NULL) AND cc.nom_tlg IS NOT NULL AND d.kod_isp(+) = cc.kod_isp AND ROWNUM = 1) AS last_sved_isp_tex, (SELECT b.notes FROM hd_notebook b WHERE b.kodp = c.kodp AND b.kodrec = (SELECT MAX (kodrec) FROM hd_notebook WHERE kodp = c.kodp AND dat_cont IS NOT NULL)) AS notes_cont, (SELECT b.dat_cont FROM hd_notebook b WHERE b.kodp = c.kodp AND b.kodrec = (SELECT MAX (kodrec) FROM hd_notebook WHERE kodp = c.kodp AND dat_cont IS NOT NULL)) AS dat_cont, (SELECT b.phones FROM hd_notebook b WHERE b.kodp = c.kodp AND b.kodrec = (SELECT MAX (kodrec) FROM hd_notebook WHERE kodp = c.kodp AND dat_cont IS NOT NULL)) AS phones_cont, (SELECT b.faces FROM hd_notebook b WHERE b.kodp = c.kodp AND b.kodrec = (SELECT MAX (kodrec) FROM hd_notebook WHERE kodp = c.kodp AND dat_cont IS NOT NULL)) AS faces_cont FROM hr_predabon c, dolg, e_payer a WHERE dolg.summ >= 500000 AND c.kodp = dolg.kodp AND a.kodp = c.kodp ORDER BY dolg.summ

WITH dolg AS (select kodp, sum(dolg) as summ from table (sqlb_dolg_uved_bu_sf.get(sysdate,null)) sf inner join hr_bu_akr a on sf.kod_bu_akt = a.kod_bu_akt where a.dat > ADD_MONTHS (SYSDATE, -35) group by kodp) SELECT dolg.kodp, a.name, dolg.summ, (SELECT COUNT (*) AS kol_pr FROM hr_arx_pred c2 WHERE c2.kodp = c.kodp AND c2.nom_tlg IS NOT NULL) AS kol_pred, hr_tf.dolg_last_pred (c.kodp) AS dat_last_pred, (SELECT COUNT (*) AS kol_tex FROM hr_dogpotr c3, hr_arx_tex c2 WHERE c3.kodp = c.kodp AND (c3.date_fin IS NULL OR c3.date_fin > SYSDATE) AND c2.codeabon = c3.codeabon AND c2.nom_tlg IS NOT NULL) AS kol_tex, (SELECT MAX (b.dat_tlg) FROM hr_dogpotr a2, hr_arx_tex b WHERE a2.kodp = c.kodp AND (a2.date_fin IS NULL OR a2.date_fin > SYSDATE) AND b.codeabon = a2.codeabon AND b.nom_tlg IS NOT NULL) AS last_dat_tex, (SELECT DISTINCT d.name FROM hr_dogpotr a2, hr_arx_tex cc, n_sved d WHERE a2.kodp = c.kodp AND (a2.date_fin IS NULL OR a2.date_fin > SYSDATE) AND cc.codeabon = a2.codeabon AND cc.dat_tlg = (SELECT MAX (dat_tlg) FROM hr_arx_tex WHERE codeabon = cc.codeabon AND nom_tlg IS NOT NULL) AND cc.nom_tlg IS NOT NULL AND d.kod_isp(+) = cc.kod_isp AND ROWNUM = 1) AS last_sved_isp_tex, (SELECT b.notes FROM hd_notebook b WHERE b.kodp = c.kodp AND b.kodrec = (SELECT MAX (kodrec) FROM hd_notebook WHERE kodp = c.kodp AND dat_cont IS NOT NULL)) AS notes_cont, (SELECT b.dat_cont FROM hd_notebook b WHERE b.kodp = c.kodp AND b.kodrec = (SELECT MAX (kodrec) FROM hd_notebook WHERE kodp = c.kodp AND dat_cont IS NOT NULL)) AS dat_cont, (SELECT b.phones FROM hd_notebook b WHERE b.kodp = c.kodp AND b.kodrec = (SELECT MAX (kodrec) FROM hd_notebook WHERE kodp = c.kodp AND dat_cont IS NOT NULL)) AS phones_cont, (SELECT b.faces FROM hd_notebook b WHERE b.kodp = c.kodp AND b.kodrec = (SELECT MAX (kodrec) FROM hd_notebook WHERE kodp = c.kodp AND dat_cont IS NOT NULL)) AS faces_cont FROM hr_predabon c, dolg, e_payer a WHERE dolg.summ >= 500000 AND c.kodp = dolg.kodp AND a.kodp = c.kodp ORDER BY dolg.summ
